channel.title: Runescape is gonan shutdown
channel.description:
In memory of the game we all at least once loved....
I have opened a new site: http://www.riprunescape.com
On the first day of January and the first day of the new year 2008 Jagex will officially KILL the RuneScape that we have all come to know and love.
Pay your respects at the site. Soldja

No, they don’t want cheaters and think if they ruin the game cheaters will fuck off. Jagex also think, if they fuck runescape over enough, all the runescapers will move over to mechscape.[/quote]
^ thats what i was thinking.

item.title: Runescape is gonan shutdown
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:26, topic:164162”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=222921.msg1927744#msg1927744 date=1197525968]

Because you and some other pkers are quiting it doesn’t mean other people are quiting also.

It isn’t just pkers, it’s merchanters and old timers. You cannot trade(unfairly), you cannot drop trade, there’s no fucking risk in the game. You cannot lend friends items, so if you get hacked your fucked.
[/quote]What will the hacker take? Nothing. I’ll make a bot or something to drop 2,999 GP at a time and use a multi client hack to drop trade. Problem solved.[/quote]

Now, I haven’t looked at the update fully, but I’m sure there are plenty of exploits to waste money, maybe not for the hackers gain but I’m sure you can still sell + buy until 0 gp.

Read full topic

Im going to stop until about 2 months after January and see how everythings going with balances. Selling a whip for 1.25m then buying it back for 1.37m (jagex price) the day after the balanced trade update is really odd.

item.title: Runescape is gonan shutdown
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Runescape will not die.
The idiots who are quiting it are the pkers, since a big crowd doesn’t even PK but only skills they’ll still have many members.
You’re just wasting your time on posting this, we don’t care.

Because you and some other pkers are quiting it doesn’t mean other people are quiting also.
I do still play and don’t give a fuck about it anymore.
Who does actually care lol, you play a game or not.
You guys are just overreacting kids and think you get everything when you’re protesting and spamming a bit.
Trust me, it aren’t many people actually hating those updates.
The majority of people actually protesting are wannabe-mods and reporting the people or are just coming for the cheap items.

If you don’t like it go sell your items and leave the website.
Thats everything I can suggest you, after that stop posting those topics.
Thanks lol

mrrules:

I’m just saying they have lost more then half there members.

Thats what they’re thinking.
But not probably not true.
First they losed all their members? Now half of their members? Then quarter? Now a half again?
Thats what I mean, it’s changing every hour.
If you cry about the pking, then go to the duel arena? Clan wars?
Otherwise quit.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape is gonan shutdown
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

Who cares, we’ll just go cheat at WoW or something.

Frell:

T’was two weeks before Christmas, and all through Runescape Not a player had known what would soon be their fate. The updates were posted on the website with care, In hopes that all players would like what was there. I logged onto Runescape and what did I see? Four new updates were listed, Wonder what they could be? Real world trading is bad, its evil they say A new Jagex fight against cheaters today! Real money for gold, their raking in lots. Kill all the autoers, kill all the bots! Removing unbalanced trades, *What the heck is that? Means all those merchants will never get their phat! Farewell birthday gifts, no more helping a friend. No more running nats, *Just where will it end? This 1st post was painful, yet I just pressed through. But I held my breath as I opened number 2. Trade and drop changes, seems like lots of chatter. I clicked on the link to see what was the matter. 3k gold pieces is now the trade limit. No more getting Barrows, unless millions are in it Drop parties are out, drop transfers are too. A gravestone is left if a Fire Giant kills you. No more getting rich when a noob makes a mistake. Those items are no longer yours for the take. I could not believe, in what was to be With an unsteady hand, I clicked post number 3. Wilderness changes? Please say its not so! Revenant ghosts? Now thats a low blow! Bounty Hunter, Bounty Hunter, Why is it multi? If you go solo, you surely will die. I PKd for a living, I guess thats now done. Jagex, you ruined it, its no longer fun. No more PKing, no more easy dough. No more Runescape, looks like its time to go If you liked this post, and I hope that you might. Copy and paste it, LETS PUT UP A FIGHT! We can get our Wildy back, if we all stick together. If Jagex don’t listen, we’ll all quit FOREVER!!!

I’ve seen this posted on another cheating community.

Read full topic

Jagex is not going to shut down. They will lose a shitload of people. 99% of them are cheaters / gold sellers. They know though that eventually in like 10 years it will bounce back or they are hoping it will.

[/quote]

they are not going to see 200k members back in a week or month trust me it will take like 6 months… and they will keep making their game shittier[/quote]
